articles.title: UIDAI Update: How to get Aadhaar PVC cards for full family using one mobile number - Economic Times
articles.description: You can use any mobile number to receive OTP for authentication, regardless of the registered mobile number with your Aadhaar. So, one person can order Aadhaar PVC cards online for the whole family.
